name: canshare-who-haematology-t-nk-cell-other-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid T-cell and natural killer cell neoplasm other histology
description: Histologies used for T-cell and natural killer cell neoplasm (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours latest edition) or an 'Other' value.
